com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.retrieve_and_rank.v1

Interface ClusterLifecycleManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RetrieveAndRank

    public interface ClusterLifecycleManager
    A client for communicating with the Retrieve and Rank API.

        ServiceCall<java.lang.Void> deleteSolrCluster(java.lang.String solrClusterId)
        Deletes an existing Solr Cluster SolrCluster.
        Reports success even if no corresponding cluster actually exists.

        solrClusterId - the Solr cluster id
